custom-sql.sql: SELECT DISTINCT CT_Analytics_AnalyticsReferrer.referrerClassPK AS referrerClassPK, CT_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.className AS className, CT_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.classPK AS classPK, CT_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.eventType AS eventType, CT_TrackingActionInstance.alias_ AS alias FROM CT_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent INNER JOIN CT_TrackingActionInstance ON (CT_TrackingActionInstance.eventType = CT_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.eventType) AND (CT_TrackingActionInstance.referrerClassName = CT_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.className) AND (CT_TrackingActionInstance.referrerClassPK = CT_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.classPK) INNER JOIN CT_Analytics_AnalyticsReferrer ON (CT_Analytics_AnalyticsReferrer.analyticsEventId = CT_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.analyticsEventId) WHERE (CT_TrackingActionInstance.campaignId = ?) AND (CT_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.createDate >= ?) ORDER BY CT_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.createDate DESC

SELECT DISTINCT CT_Analytics_AnalyticsReferrer.referrerClassPK AS referrerClassPK, CT_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.elementId AS elementId, CT_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.eventType AS eventType, CT_TrackingActionInstance.alias_ AS alias FROM CT_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent INNER JOIN CT_TrackingActionInstance ON (CT_TrackingActionInstance.eventType = CT_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.eventType) AND (CT_TrackingActionInstance.elementId = CT_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.elementId) INNER JOIN CT_Analytics_AnalyticsReferrer ON (CT_Analytics_AnalyticsReferrer.analyticsEventId = CT_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.analyticsEventId) WHERE (CT_TrackingActionInstance.campaignId = ?) AND (CT_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.createDate >= ?) ORDER BY CT_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.createDate DESC

SELECT CT_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.className AS className, CT_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.classPK AS classPK, CT_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.eventType AS eventType, COUNT(*) as count FROM CT_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent WHERE (CT_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.createDate >= ?) AND (CT_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.classPK != 0) GROUP BY CT_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.className, CT_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.classPK, CT_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.eventType ORDER BY CT_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.createDate DESC

SELECT CT_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.elementId AS elementId, CT_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.eventType AS eventType, COUNT(*) as count FROM CT_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent WHERE (CT_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.createDate >= ?) AND (CT_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.elementId != '') GROUP BY CT_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.elementId, CT_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.eventType ORDER BY CT_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.createDate DESC
